ecogClassifier¶

class ecog_processing.ecog_classifier.ECoG_NN(in_features, transfer_func)¶

Neural network for ECoG classification

forward(x)¶

Defines the computation performed at every call.

Should be overridden by all subclasses.

Note

Although the recipe for forward pass needs to be defined within this function, one should call the Module instance afterwards instead of this since the former takes care of running the registered hooks while the latter silently ignores them.

ecog_processing.ecog_classifier.get_data(data_loc: str) → tuple¶

Get saved dataframe data

Parameters:data_loc – Location of patient dataframes
ecog_processing.ecog_classifier.make_all_data(all_data, labels)¶

Helper function to create training data given zeros and ones

Parameters:
  • all_data – zeros data
  • labels – ones data
ecog_processing.ecog_classifier.run_nn(zeros, ones)¶

Runs neural network on the given data

Parameters:
  • zeros – Zeros data
  • ones – Ones data
ecog_processing.ecog_classifier.run_tpot(zeros, ones)¶

Runs tpot on the given data

Parameters:
  • zeros – Zero data
  • ones – Ones data
Effects:

Exports fitted pipeline in ‘tpot_ecog_pipeline.py’
